enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.
title: WCAS SPANISH 201-0-23 Conversation on Human Rights: Latin America
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: First course of sequence designed to develop speaking strategies and structures through analysis of modern (20th- and 21st- century) Latin American culture. Emphasis on accurate informal conversation.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisites: 199 or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam
Three class meetings a week

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: For more information on the course contact the coordinator Penny Nichols pen@northwestern.edu

subject: SPANISH
